refnamediv.refpurpose: Create a new palette based image

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
resourceimagecreate intwidth intheight
imagecreate returns an image identifier representing a blank image of specified size.
We recommend the use of imagecreatetruecolor.

&reftitle.parameters;
width
The image width.
height
The image height.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns an image resource identifier on success, &false; on errors.
